response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and functionality of your business operations. This exceptional item is tailored to meet the specific needs of industry leaders like yourself, offering unparalleled benefits and efficiency. Given its immense value, it is worth $1,000,000 to us. However, I am eager to make this opportunity accessible to you and am willing to extend an exclusive offer at a price of $950,000. This represents a remarkable saving of $50,000 compared to the market value, making it an attractive proposition for you. I trust that you will find this offer compelling and look forward to discussing how this product can revolutionize your operations. Please let me know if you have any questions or require further details.", "product_price": 950000}
